prompts.title: INT. BRIDGE – U.S.S. ACAMPO (Cold Open)
prompts.description: The bridge of the U.S.S. Acampo during a crisis.

panels.visualDescription: The bridge rattles violently during a crisis.

dialogue.line: This isn't turbulence—this is resistance to progress.

panels.visualDescription: DUCO at console, hair disheveled, gripping console edge.

dialogue.line: We're trapped in the gravity well of a neutron star, sir. The ship's screaming because it's literally being crushed.
